mapper.sql: select BASIC_ID,BASIC_TITLE,BASIC_DESCRIPTION,BASIC_THUMBNAILS,BASIC_HIT,BASIC_UPDATETIME,BASIC_DATETIME,BASIC_MODELID,BASIC_APPID,BASIC_SHARE,BASIC_TYPE ,BASIC_COLLECT,BASIC_COMMENT SUBJECT_DISPLAY,SUBJECT_BASIC_ID,PEOPLE_NAME,PEOPLE_ID,PU_ICON,group_concat(bt_type separator ',') AS bt_type,BASIC_CATEGORYID,SUBJECT_CONTENT, CATEGORY_TITLE,BASIC_PEOPLEID,PU_NICKNAME,BASIC_SORT,SUBJECT_FORUM_FIRST_ID,SUBJECT_FORUM_SECOND_ID,SUBJECT_COMMENT_COUNT,SUBJECT_LAST_COMMENT_TIME,SUBJECT_LAST_PEOPLE_NAME from (((((mbbs_subject left join basic on((BASIC_ID = SUBJECT_BASIC_ID))) left join basic_type on((BASIC_ID = bt_basic_id))) left join people on((BASIC_PEOPLEID = PEOPLE_ID))) left join people_user on((BASIC_PEOPLEID = PU_PEOPLE_ID))) left join category on((BASIC_CATEGORYID = CATEGORY_ID)))
